title: BYOB: Build Your Own Business, Be Your Own Boss
description: BYOB Build Your Own Business. Be Your Own Boss.Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime? Buckle serial entrepreneur Brian Scudamore is your guide on the journey of entrepreneurship, taking you through inspiring stories, hilarious anecdotes, and just a few industry secrets so you can start your own startup — today."Brilliant. Absolutely brilliant!"— Michael E. Gerber, author of the E-Myth books"For anyone looking for a master class on how to take the leap and build something great, Brian's guide will help them navigate the journey."— Guy Raz, creator of the How I Built This podcast"In Build Your Own Business, Be Your Own Boss , Brian Scudamore challenges anyone with a dream of business ownership to dive in."— Verne Harnish, Founder, CEO, and author of Scaling Up"A roadmap for every aspiring entrepreneur. This will drive you from thinking to doing."— Jason Feifer, Editor in Chief of Entrepreneur magazine
author: Brian Scudamore
